abstract: Update | 5:52 p.m. The American International Group, the battered insurance giant that is now effectively majority-owned by the federal government, is in talks to receive more government aid as it prepares to record another giant loss, a person briefed on the talks told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Update | 5:52 p.m. The American International Group, the battered insurance giant that is now effectively majority-owned by the federal government, is in talks to receive more government aid as it prepares to record another giant loss, a person briefed on the talks told DealBook.

headline.main: A.I.G. to Seek More Government Aid
